oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The names of !nanni's grandparents and information about them (whether they are living or not and what !kun-speaking group they belong to). 1) See also Tamme's experiences before coming to Mowbray, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nanni's grandparents
